markdownRemark.html:
It is important to challenge yourself.

This past year, I’ve promised myself I would start blogging. I’ve failed, but I’m still not giving up on it.

This is the beginning. Welcome to Francisco Amado’s incoherent ideas dumpster.

I’ll Tackle

  • Why I’m doing this
  • What is this for
  • What is this not for

frontmatter.title: Starting Something New
frontmatter.description: It is important to challenge yourself. This past year, I've promised myself I would start blogging. I've failed, but I'm still not giving up on it. This is the beginning. Welcome to Francisco Amado's incoherent ideas dumpster.
